channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo

item.title: American’s largest water utility just got hit by a cyberattack
item.description: American Water services more than 14 million people across 32 states and military installations.

item.title: TikTok Faces Lawsuits From 13 States Around Teens and Mental Health
item.description: More than a dozen states sued TikTok on Tuesday for creating an app designed to be addictive to children and teens.

item.title: Hurricane Milton is already mucking up professional sports, canceling games and throwing schedules out of whack
item.description: Milton, a Category 5 hurricane, is expected to hit Florida in the next 24 hours.

item.description: “If meteorologists could stop hurricanes, we would stop hurricanes,” said Kristen Corbosiero.

item.title: Russia Pushes Forward in Ukraine’s East After Fall of Vuhledar
item.description: Russian troops have now entered Toretsk, a strategic hilltop city, and are pressing with assaults elsewhere in the Donetsk region.
